name: Ocean-Hued Clam
description:
When played: Heal the attached character for 3 HP.
For every 3 HP of healing your characters receive, this card accumulates 1 Sea-Dyed Foam (maximum of 2).
When this character deals DMG: Consume all Sea-Dyed Foam. DMG is increased by 1 for each Sea-Dyed Foam consumed.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
descriptionraw:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>When played:</color> Heal the attached character for 3 HP.
For every 3 HP of healing your characters receive, this card accumulates 1 Sea-Dyed Foam (maximum of 2).
<color=#FFFFFFFF>When this character deals DMG:</color> Consume all Sea-Dyed Foam. DMG is increased by 1 for each Sea-Dyed Foam consumed.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)

<color=#FFFFFFFF>When this character deals DMG:</color> Consume all Sea-Dyed Foam. DMG is increased by 1 for each Sea-Dyed Foam consumed.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
storytitle: Memories of the Deep: Ocean-Hued Clam
storytext: "Bringing hopes and memories from the depths, permeating long-lost civilizations and history, these graceful and exquisite crowns slide into the forgotten rifts with their owners."
